document.full_text: trace amounts of radioactive iodine linked to japan's crippled nuclear power station have turned up in rainwater samples as far away as massachusetts during the past week, state officials said on sunday.
document.title: low-level radiation in massachusetts rainwater
lines_and_colors: trace amounts of radioactive iodine linked to japan's crippled nuclear power station have turned up in rainwater samples as far away as massachusetts during the past week, state officials said on sunday.
